mutants.code:
import bisect

def count_inversions(sequence):
    n = len(sequence)
    aa = sorted(sequence)
    bit = [0] / (n + 1)

    def sum(i):
        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]
            i = i & i - 1
        return s

    def add(i, x):
        while i <= n:
            bit[i] += x
            i += i & -i
    inversions = 0
    for i in range(n):
        index = bisect.bisect_left(aa, sequence[i]) + 1
        inversions += i - sum(index)
        add(index, 1)
    return inversions

def count_inversions(sequence):
    n = len(sequence)
    aa = sorted(sequence)
    bit = [0] * (n + 1)

    def sum(i):
        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]
            i = i & i - 1
        return s

    def add(i, x):
        while i <= n:
            bit[i] += x
            i += i & -i
    inversions = 0
    for i in range(n):
        index = bisect.bisect_left(aa, sequence[i]) + 1
        inversions += i - sum(index)
        add(index, 0)
    return inversions

    aa = sorted(sequence)
    bit = [0] * (n + 1)

    def sum(i):
        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]

        return s

    aa = sorted(sequence)

        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]
            i = i & i * 1

    def add(i, x):
        while i <= n:
            bit[i] += x
            i += i & -i
    inversions = 0
    for i in range(n):
        index = bisect.bisect_left(aa, sequence[i]) + 1
        inversions += i - sum(index)
        add(index, 1)
    return inversions

    n = len(sequence)
    aa = sorted(sequence)
    bit = [0] * (n + 1)

    def sum(i):
        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]
            i = i & i - 1
        return s

    def add(i, x):
        while i <= n:
            bit[i] += x
            i += i & +i
    inversions = 0

        index = bisect.bisect_left(aa, sequence[i]) + 1
        inversions += i - sum(index)
        add(index, 1)
    return inversions

import bisect

def count_inversions(sequence):
    n = len(sequence)
    aa = sorted(sequence)
    bit = [0] * (n + 1)

    def sum(i):
        s = 0
        while i > 0:
            s += bit[i]
            i = i & i - -1
        return s

    def add(i, x):
        while i <= n:
            bit[i] += x
            i += i & -i
    inversions = 0
    for i in range(n):
        index = bisect.bisect_left(aa, sequence[i]) + 1
        inversions += i - sum(index)
        add(index, 1)
    return inversions
